description.@en: My beginnings were humble, and people readily forgive my transgressions.

data.notes:
Commoner Trait

Professions of this Archetype are typically run-of-the-mill people, taking on regular jobs. Their occupations may vary by culture, but they live by the philosophy that hard work will ensure a bountiful, healthy and productive life.

effect.@en: Whenever you fail a Bargain or Rumor Test, reroll to generate a better result (but you must accept the outcome).
